class rst_budoux.WordBreak(rawsource='', *children, **attributes)

ベースクラス: Element [https://sphinx-docutils.readthedocs.io/en/latest/docutils.nodes.html#docutils.nodes.Element]

A node to explicit that breakpoint of sentence.

tagname = 'word-break'

The element generic identifier. If None, it is set as an instance attribute to the name of the class.

rst_budoux.parse_all_sentences(parser: Parser, document: document [https://sphinx-docutils.readthedocs.io/en/latest/docutils.nodes.html#docutils.nodes.document]) → document [https://sphinx-docutils.readthedocs.io/en/latest/docutils.nodes.html#docutils.nodes.document]
